channel.description: Recent content in Life on Prince Namwali

item.title: 2021 Resolutions
item.description: Goals Learning out loud Learn how to create ebooks using Markdown and Pandoc Build a website using Hugo Create a website on IPFS Fully adopt the Crash mindset Learn & Master Vim Create a name generator Take more cold showers Learn Korean - Read Manhwa without waiting for scanlators Create an effective Second Brain Daily Blogging (Work in progress…) Hack sleep for lucid dreaming Buy a custom domain (.xyz migrated from the netlify subdomain) Improve my touch typing (160WPM).

item.title: 2020 Year In Review
item.description: What I Learned Inter-Planetary File System (IPFS) Blockstack Privacy Hardening using Privacy Tools Markdown Decentralized Applications (Dapps) Metamask Reedsy Figma Unstoppable Domains Search Engine Optimization (SEO) - First page results on Google & other search engines (name search). Content I Consumed The Social Dilemna (Documentary) College is Dead Capitalism: A Love Story (Documentary) Minimalism: A Documentary About The Important Things The Stories We Tell About Money Dreams Dont Come True, Decisions Do Watch This Before You … Bucket List Deconsructed Racism #BlackLivesMatter I Sued The School System Why I Hate School,But Love Education

item.title: Covid-19 Lessons
item.description: Covid-19 2020 shall be recalled in history books as the year of change. Multiple things happened, many words can be assigned to the year 2020, but it all comes down to one final world, change. 2020 was supposed to be the year of vision, as a reference to visual acuity, something utilized in the medical/healthcare field. Lessons Health is the greatest wealth Financial Freedom is better than financial security When a person is unable to change their situation, they are forced to change themselves.
